Burma: Chinese invade Upper Burma, demanding surrender of a runaway Shan chief. His dead body was given up. Chinese records say events occurred in 1448–1449
China: The Precious Belt Bridge was rebuilt.
India: Mallikarjuna Raya succeeds his father Deva Raya II
Russia: Shemyaka had Vasili II blinded and exiled to Uglich, and had himself declared the Grand Prince.
